verses.roman:
'api'-śabda--avadhāraṇe, seha cāri bāra
cāri-śabda-saṅge evera karibe uccāra

synonyms: api-śabda—the word api; avadhāraṇe—in the matter of ascertaining; seha cāri bāra—those four times; cāri-śabda—four words; saṅge—with; evera—of the word eva; karibe—one can do; uccāra—pronouncing.
translation: "The word api is then used in the sense of ascertainment, and then four times with four words the word eva can be uttered.
